newsitem.title: HONG KONG: China Elegance issues 40 mln new shares.
newsitem.headline: China Elegance issues 40 mln new shares.

text.p: China Elegance International Fashion Ltd said on Thursday it plans to issue 40 million new shares to Mansyong International Development Ltd at HK$3.95 per share, raising net proceeds of about HK$156 million.

Mansyong International, a substantial shareholder of the company, has also agreed to place 40 million existing China Elegance shares, or 20 percent of the existing issued share capital, to private investors at HK$3.95 per share, China Elegance said in a statement.
The issue and placement price represented a 6.5 percent discount to the shares' Wednesday close of HK$4.225 per share.

China Elegance said about HK$60 million of the proceeds would be used for the development of production facilities and a distribution network for leather fashion, menswear and accessories under the Giovanni Valentino brandname.
The remaining HK$96 million would be used as general working capital.

China Elegance said Mansyong and related parties would hold about 50 percent of the company's issued share capital after the placement and new issues compared with about 60 percent before the transactions. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6369
